data.name: Black Space
data.detailed_description:
An arena space shooter has just arrived to you!


This small game is a 2D singleplayer space shooter. But instead of an RPG or top-down scrolling game this time it is an arena style game.

It is meant for quick time wasting, so you can quickly launch a game, play a bit and then do something else.

Black Space is free, without any costs.

Default keys:
wasd: Move forward/backward & strafe left/right
left/right arrow: Turn ship
space: Fire your weapon
1-0: Select weapon
shift: Use speed boost
tab: Show scores
esc: Pause game and show menu
^: Toggle console

Have much fun and a relaxing time with this game!

Credits for menu theme: Manuel Senfft (www.tagirijus.de)

data.short_description: Black Space is a free arena-styled singleplayer 2D space shooter using top-down perspective.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz or more
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD chipcard or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
